Name: Elixir De Longue Vie (Elixir of Long Life)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Chestnut, pineau de charente and chartreuse combine with cognac to create a most unusual cocktail with zesty lemon freshness.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Kevin Galliano at Big Easy, Covent Garden, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Elixir De Longue Vie (Elixir of Long Life) contains 163 calories
